TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ObjectManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 在物件還原序列化時保持追蹤。

span.span: Keeps track of objects as they are deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 還原序列化期間查詢來判斷是否參考到序列化資料流中的物件是指已經過已還原序列化的物件 （回溯參考），或尚未經過物件還原序列化 （向前參考）。During deserialization, the queries the to determine whether a reference to an object in the serialized stream refers to an object that has already been deserialized (a backward reference), or to an object that has not yet been deserialized (a forward reference). 如果序列化的資料流的參考是向前參考，然後在可以註冊以修復。If the reference in the serialized stream is a forward reference, then the can register a fixup with the . 如果序列化的資料流中的參考是回溯的參考，立即完成的參考。If the reference in the serialized stream is a backward reference, the immediately completes the reference. 修復參考最終化期間物件還原序列化程序尚未完成的物件參考的程序。Fixup refers to the process of finalizing object references not already completed during the object deserialization process. 已還原序列化所需的物件之後，才會完成的參考。After the required object has been deserialized, the will complete the reference. 遵循一組指示修復順序的規則。The follows a set of rules that dictate the fixup order. 實作的所有物件或具有可預期會有它們透過傳輸的所有物件還原序列化物件樹狀結構時使用。All objects that implement or have a can expect to have all the objects that they transmitted through available when the object tree is deserialized. 不過，在父物件無法假設，其所有子物件將會完全都完成完整還原序列化時。However, a parent object cannot presume that all its child objects will be fully completed when it is fully deserialized. 所有子物件將都會出現，但並非所有的孫系物件一定都會存在。All child objects will be present but not all the grandchild objects will necessarily be present. 如果物件需要採取某些動作，取決於子物件上執行程式碼，這些動作的延遲時間、 可以實作介面，並將它重新呼叫這個介面上時，才執行程式碼。If an object needs to take certain actions that depend on executing code on its child objects, it can delay these actions, implement the interface, and execute the code only when it is called back on this interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用逐步物件圖形，一次周遊至每個物件的類別。The following code example shows how to use the class to walk through an object graph, traversing to each object only once. [!code-csharp[ObjectManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/ObjectManager/CS/ObjectManager.cs#1)]

span.span: The surrogate selector to use.

param.span: 會決定還原序列化指定之型別的物件時所使用的正確代理。

span.span: The determines the correct surrogate to use when deserializing objects of a given type.

param.span: 在還原序列化時，代理選取器會從資料流上傳輸的資訊建立新的物件執行個體。

span.span: At deserialization time, the surrogate selector creates a new instance of the object from the information transmitted on the stream.

param.name: context
param.span: 資料流內容。

span.span: The streaming context.

param.span: 不使用 ，但是該內容會當做參數傳入任何實作 或具有 的物件。

span.span: The is not used by , but is passed as a parameter to any objects implementing or having a .

param.span: 這些物件可以根據還原序列化的資訊來源執行特定的動作。

span.span: These objects can take specific actions depending on the source of the information to deserialize.

span.span: Performs all the recorded fixups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 修復會執行的任何適當的代理物件本身 (如果它實作)，或預設實作。The fixups are carried out by any appropriate surrogate, the object itself (if it implements ), or the default implementation.

span.span: A fixup was not successfully completed.

span.span: Registers a member of an object as it is deserialized, associating it with , and recording the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您需要提供`member`和`idOfContainingObj`參數如果`obj`是方式上執行修復物件。You need to provide the `member` and `idOfContainingObj` parameters if `obj` is a because of the way fixups are performed on objects. 若要儲存之資訊的空間配置內嵌於其包含的物件。The space to store the information for a is allocated inline with its containing object. 不過，當會進行 boxed 處理向，就會失去與包含物件的連接。However, when the is boxed to be registered with the , it loses the connection with its containing object. 若要保證修復進行中的執行個體儲存的已封裝的執行個體，包含的物件而非會保留一些額外的資訊。To guarantee that fixups occur in the instance of the stored in the containing object and not in the boxed instance, the retains some additional information. 保留資訊的物件以及其識別碼。 retains information about both the object and its ID. 還原序列化期間更新可用來探索是否已還原序列化特定物件識別碼，或它是否不是物件的向前參考尚未還原序列化。Later during deserialization, can be used to discover whether a particular object ID has already been deserialized, or whether it is a forward reference to an object not yet deserialized.
